PrecisRegulations Amending the COMPETENCY OF OPERATORS OF PLEASURE CRAFT REGULATIONS by authorizing the Canadian Coast Guard to suspend or revoke the accreditation of a boating safety course or test where it believes that they are being administered in such a manner that a participant's knowledge of these matters is doubtful.
